verses.text: Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. Manhxo jantacoc svach'il co b'itan b'it t'a co Diosal. Smojton val co b'itan t'ay yet' juntzanh b'it te wach'.
Ha Jehová sb'oanxi Jerusalén, ol smolb'ejxicot eb' quetisraelal sacleminac yajcanb'ati.
Ha tz'ak'an snivanil sk'ol eb' pitz'anoch cuselal t'a spixan. A' tz'anhtan syaelal eb' chi'.
A' na'annac jantac sb'isul q'uen k'anal sb'onac, yak'annacoch sb'i junjun q'ueen.
Yelxo val te niwan yelk'och co Diosal tik, niwan spoder, malaj slajvub'al sjelanil.
A' tz'ik'an q'ue vaan eb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui, palta a eb' sk'ulan chucal, tz'ik'chajcanem eb' sik'lab'il yuj.
Co b'itejec Jehová yic scak'an yuj diosal yet' te' arpa sco b'itejec.
A' tz'ak'anoch asun t'a satcha’anh, slajvi chi' syak'ancot nhab' t'a sat lu'um tik. A' tz'ak'an q'uib' anh ank'ultak t'a tzalquixtac.
Anhejton pax ha' tz'ak'an svael nok' nok' yet' nok' yunetac joj ayic tz'el yav nok' yuj vejel.
Ha Jehová, max tzalajlaj yet' eb' anima tz'ak'anoch yip nok' chej, ma yipal eb' soldado yipoc sk'ool.
Palta stzalaj yet' eb' ay xivk'olal t'ay, aton eb' tz'ak'anoch svach'k'olal yipoc sk'ool.
Ex aj Jerusalén, calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. Ex aj Sion, co b'itejec co Diosal.
A' tz'ak'anoch yip yijchuloc spuertail chonhab' Jerusalén, syak'anpax svach'k'olal t'a eb' cuninal.
A' tz'ak'an junk'olal t'a yol smacb'en co chonhab' tik, syak'anpax b'ud'joc yuj ixim trigo te wach'.
A' tz'ak'ancot slolonel t'a sat lu'um tik, elanhchamel tz'elk'ochi.
Ha co Diosal tz'ak'ancot q'uen sacb'acom icha yilji sac lana. A' tz'ak'anoch q'uen cheev pococal, icha q'uen tik'aq'uil taanh tz'ajkan q'ueen.
A' tz'ak'ancot q'uen sacb'at icha q'uen cotac q'ueen. Axo val sical q'ueen, malaj junok mach stechaj yuj.
Syalanpaxi to tz'ulaxb'at q'ueen, syak'ancot ik', yic sb'ey yalil q'ueen chi'.
Ha slolonel yet' sk'ayb'ub'al, ix yak' cojtaquejel a onh israel yinhtilal onh vinhaj Jacob tik.
Manh ichocta' ix yutej t'a junocxo nación. Maj yojtaquejel-laj sk'ayb'ub'al co Diosal juntzanhxo chonhab' chi'. Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
